Name: Armor Scarf
LongDescription: Absorbs damage from Grass-type moves to restore HP.  Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Phanpy and Donphan.  You can get an Armor Scarf at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Donphan Fang, a Donphan Card, and a Don-Crest. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
